posts.post_title: HOF Old Judge Cabinets For Sale
posts.post_content:
Keefe $12,500
Ewing Now at REA Marketplace

These are two of the nicest 19th Century Cabinets I've come across. The altered grade is likely representative very subtle eraser marks on the reverse that take nothing away from the stunning images.
